JecsTools.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: And Cain talked with Abel his brother: and it came to pass, when they were in the field, that Cain rose up against Abel his brother, and slew him. - Genesis 4:8
JecsTools.BackstoryDef.title: Kinslayer

JecsTools.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: And the LORD said unto him, Therefore whosoever slayeth Cain, vengeance shall be taken on him sevenfold. And the LORD set a mark upon Cain, lest any finding him should kill him. - Genesis 4:15
JecsTools.BackstoryDef.title: Marked
